title: SMS PAYMENT
body: bought 215rp with sms. i lost money but didnt get the rp ( answered the message with PAY but nothing happened)  how can i cancel it or get my rp?

replies.body: There may have been a delay in your process, or it may not have gone through.  If you're still having this issue, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to find out for sure.  Our billing team will be able to review this and find some options best for you.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
